title: AG pick Pam Bondi is 4th ex-Trump defense lawyer selected for DOJ
shortDescription: Former Florida Attorney General Pam Bondi is at least the fourth former or current Trump defense lawyer nominated for the Justice Department.

title: Sebastian Gorka, firebrand commentator, to return to Trump White House
shortDescription: Donald Trump named Sebastian Gorka, a controversial firebrand commentator who served in his first administration, to a national security role.

title: Trump picks Martin Makary of Johns Hopkins as FDA commissioner
shortDescription: The FDA is responsible for protecting the public health by ensuring the safety, efficacy, and security of human and veterinary drugs.

title: Trump taps Russell Vought, Project 2025 architect, to lead OMB
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump has picked Russell Vought, a key architect of Project 2025 and defender of strong presidential powers, as OMB director.

title: Dr. Dave Weldon, former Florida congressman, picked as CDC director
shortDescription: While in Congress, Weldon introduced a bill that would give responsibility for the nation's vaccine safety to an independent agency within the HHS.

title: See Trump's latest picks from Scott Bessent to Lori Chavez-DeRemer
shortDescription: Donald Trump has nominated Scott Bessent to be the next Treasury secretary and Russell Vought as Office of Management and Budget director.

title: Trump picks Scott Turner, ex-NFL player, as HUD secretary
shortDescription: Under Turner’s leadership, Opportunity Zones received over $50 billion in private investment, according to Trump.

title: Trump picks Dr. Janette Nesheiwat as US Surgeon General
shortDescription: Her book illuminates the transformative power of prayer and unwavering dedication to healing and service.

title: Trump taps GOP Rep. Lori Chavez-DeRemer to lead Labor Department
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump will nominate Rep. Lori Chavez-DeRemer, R-Ore., to lead the Labor Department.

title: Melania Trump appoints longtime aide as East Wing chief of staff
shortDescription: Trump said Harrison had a “strong understanding of White House operations,” and in her new role would “oversee and manage the East Wing’s team."

title: Trump no dijo que dará permisos de trabajo a inmigrantes | Hechos
shortDescription: No encontramos que Donald Trump hubiese anunciado que daría “permiso a inmigrantes trabajadores para estar legal en EEUU”.

title: Planned Nissan layoffs unrelated to Trump tariff plans | Fact check
shortDescription: A company spokesperson said the proposed layoffs have nothing to do with Trump's plan to raise tariffs.

title: Anti-Trump message edited onto Schwarzenegger's T-shirt | Fact check
shortDescription: In the original image Schwarzenegger posted to Instagram in March, the former California governor's black T-shirt is blank.

title: False claim that 425,000 convicts entered US under Biden | Fact check
shortDescription: The ICE data in the posts includes people who have entered the U.S. over the past 40 or more years, not just during the Biden administration.

title: Americans share hopes and fears for second Trump presidency
shortDescription: As President-elect Donald Trump prepares for the White House again, USA TODAY spoke with people across the country to discuss hopes and fears.

title: 'Unemployment never looked so good': Gaetz's wife speaks after withdrawal
shortDescription: Ginger Luckey Gaetz has chimed in publicly after her husband, Matt Gaetz, withdrew his attorney general nomination and announced he won't rejoin Congress.

title: Democrat Bob Casey concedes in PA Senate race
shortDescription: The recount between Sen. Bob Casey and GOP businessman Dave McCormick took weeks, but McCormick kept his lead.

title: No, Newsom didn’t propose keeping state’s income taxes | Fact check
shortDescription: The claim originated with a parody account. A spokesperson for Fox News said the outlet hadn’t reported anything like the claim.

title: Matt Gaetz will not return to Congress next year
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's first pick to serve as the next attorney general won't go back to his seat after dropping out.

title: Senate bill would bar Trump from White House? Not true | Fact check
shortDescription: The Senate has not voted on the bill, which contains civil penalties for noncompliance but would not ban Trump or anyone else from the White House.

title: Trump Nov. 26 sentencing canceled, future of hush money case uncertain
shortDescription: The judge in President-elect Donald Trump's criminal hush money case has indefinitely postponed sentencing, which had been scheduled for Nov. 26.

title: 4 questions for Pam Bondi, Trump's choice for attorney general
shortDescription: Pam Bondi's critics say senators should ask her about a Trump campaign contribution, a denial of election results, lobbying for Qatar and an execution
